name: Color Climber (Chirpy's Tinkershop)
description:
“Once upon a time, there were dinosaurs..”


Meet Wrecka. A nice dino living on The Distant Isle, a quaint and peaceful little place. Until that meteor hit, at least. The meteor changed Wrecka’s life forever. Suddenly, she had to learn how to be alone, as she is one of the last of her kind. Her environment became a place full of hazards and she now spends her days trying to survive for as long as possible. It feels like the ground is crumbling underneath her big feet, no matter where she is! And to make matters worse, the meteor brought Jarheads down on the island. They only have one objective: to make sure there are no more dinosaurs left and the planet is theirs. Luckily Wrecka can find potions and other helpful items, but she really needs some help! All that’s missing is you.

Color climber is an arcade game inspired by the popular children’s game ‘the floor is Lava’, your objective is to keep Wrecka alive for as long as possible and to gain a lot of points in the process. You can get buffs for jumping, speed, defence and health. Color Climber is a fun game that gives you a quick adrenaline rush and will leave you wanting more.
